content.p: Cookies help us to give you the best experience on our website. You can change your cookie settings if you wish. Otherwise we'll assume you're OK to continue.OKSee our policy If you are a first year student, we want to hear about your experiences with Digital and Technology Services so far at the University of Nottingham. This survey is open to first year undergraduate, postgraduate taught and postgraduate research students. Share your experiences with technical support, computer rooms, printing Wi-Fi and software. We would encourage you to submit honest responses in order for us to build on your experiences and improve our IT services. This should take no longer than five minutes to complete. The deadline for responses is midnight on Sunday 17 November. All who complete the survey can opt in to a prize draw to win an IT goodie bag. The bag includes wireless headphones, a computer mouse, a power bank, Amazon voucher, university mug, water bottle, tote bag and more. Communications and Marketing University Park Campus Nottingham, NG7 2RD telephone:+44 (0)115 82 32353 e: studentcommsoffice@nottingham.ac.uk
